pages.text: Curiously, the combination of mushrooms and water is a perfect receptor for all forms of other bloomy notes, either rounding the taste, or creating... very peculiar ones.$()Each flower has a specific effect, as if you would feed it to a $(thing)Brown Mooshroom$(). The fermentation process in colored wood makes the effect last quite a bit longer than $(item)Suspicious Stew$().

pages.title: Titration Recipe
pages.text: The longer this brew ferments, the more powerful the effect becomes.
